caster:vfx.NAME: Vfx Test
caster:vfx.DESCRIPTION: This skill should not appear in game, it's for testing!

caster:Ashes.NAME: Ashes
caster:Ashes.DESCRIPTION: Exhausts when drawn, add a random card into your hand.

caster:defend.NAME: Defend
caster:defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you played a Spell this turn, gain !M! extra Block.

caster:PhoenixFlare.NAME: Phoenix Flare
caster:PhoenixFlare.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL At the start of your turn, if this card is in your exhaust pile, put it in your hand. NL Exhaust.

caster:Barbroot.NAME: Giga Drain
caster:Barbroot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Heal HP equal to 25% of unblocked damage dealt.

caster:WallOfMirrors.NAME: Wall Of Mirrors
caster:WallOfMirrors.DESCRIPTION: Prevent and reflect all damage dealt by target enemy this turn. NL Exhaust.

caster:WallOfRocks.NAME: Wall Of Rocks
caster:WallOfRocks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL attacking enemies.

caster:DiamondDust.NAME: Diamond Dust
caster:DiamondDust.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! caster:Frost. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain Block equal to your Block when you played this.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! caster:Frost. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain Block equal to your Block when you played this: !caster:M2! .

caster:GateOfBabylon.NAME: Gate of Babylon
caster:GateOfBabylon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every caster:unique_spell in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every caster:unique_spell in your deck. NL Unique Spells: !M!

caster:Tundra.NAME: Tundra
caster:Tundra.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Apply !M! caster:Frost and deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Play a copy of this card. NL Exhaust.

caster:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
caster:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL caster:Shocker.

caster:Thundara.NAME: Thundara
caster:Thundara.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random Spell in your hand to 0 this turn. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times.

caster:Conflagrate.NAME: Conflagrate
caster:Conflagrate.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lose !M! HP and Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you caster:Freeze this card, reduce its HP loss to 0 for this combat.

caster:MegaloSpark.NAME: Megalo Spark
caster:MegaloSpark.DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !M! random card in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies twice.
caster:MegaloSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !M! card in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies twice.

caster:AbsoluteZero.NAME: Absolute Zero
caster:AbsoluteZero.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this card, you may caster:Freeze 1 card. NL Whenever Freezing this card, double its base damage this combat. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:StaticField.NAME: Static Field
caster:StaticField.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Electrify a card gain !M! Block.

caster:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
caster:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL caster:Electrify from ALL cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each stack removed.

caster:Surge.NAME: Surge
caster:Surge.DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random card in your hand. NL Gain [E].
caster:Surge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random cards in your hand. NL Gain [E] [E].

caster:Congeal.NAME: Congeal
caster:Congeal.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Frost to ALL enemies. NL Whenever you play a Spell this turn, gain !caster:M2! Block.

caster:Permafrost.NAME: Permafrost
caster:Permafrost.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 caster:Cast_Time to all Spells you are currently casting. NL Gain !B! Block: equal to twice the sum of their caster:Cast_Time. NL Next turn, gain half that amount.
caster:Permafrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add 1 caster:Cast_Time to all Spells you are currently casting. NL Gain !B! Block: equal to twice the sum of their caster:Cast_Time. NL Next turn, gain half that amount.

caster:FreezeInHell.NAME: Freeze In Hell
caster:FreezeInHell.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Apply !M! caster:Frost to ALL enemies.

caster:FlashSpeed.NAME: Flash Speed
caster:FlashSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !B! Block. NL caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random card in your hand.

caster:FlashFrost.NAME: Flash Frost

caster:JupitelThunder.NAME: Jupitel Thunder
caster:JupitelThunder.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times. NL caster:Shocker.

caster:AshesToAshes.NAME: Ashes to Ashes
caster:AshesToAshes.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to the number of cards in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

caster:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
caster:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: caster:Burn !M! card in your hand. NL Apply caster:Blazed equal to !caster:M2! times its cost.

caster:PyroclasticTide.NAME: Pyroclastic Tide
caster:PyroclasticTide.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of ALL fire Spells by !M! this combat. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies.

caster:NaturalChaos.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: Apply !M! caster:Mired to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:GaiasBlessing.NAME: Gaia's Blessing
caster:GaiasBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

caster:Ifrit.NAME: Ifrit
caster:Ifrit.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, caster:Burn a random card in your hand and play it. NL Apply caster:Blazed equal to its cost to a random enemy.

caster:AlternatingCurrent.NAME: Alternating Current
caster:AlternatingCurrent.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy. NL Play a copy of this card.

caster:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
caster:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each Spell currently being casted. NL Currently: gain !B! Block.

caster:FrostDriver.NAME: Frost Driver
caster:FrostDriver.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: Deal !caster:D! damage, apply !M! caster:Frost.

caster:MagicResonance.NAME: Magic Resonance
caster:MagicResonance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Spell you are currently casting.

caster:MagicAttunement.NAME: Magic Attunement
caster:MagicAttunement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.

caster:SoulStrike.NAME: Soul Strike
caster:SoulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Exhaust.

caster:Fissure.NAME: Fissure

caster:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
caster:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Reduce this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

caster:ShivasGrace.NAME: Shiva's Grace
caster:ShivasGrace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Freeze a card, gain !M! plated armor.

caster:MagicWeapon.NAME: Magic Weapon
caster:MagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards, discard all non-Spells drawn this way.

caster:Illusion.NAME: Illusion
caster:Illusion.DESCRIPTION: Change the enemy intent to Block this round. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

caster:StormGust.NAME: Storm Gust
caster:StormGust.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! cards. caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !caster:M2! caster:Frost to ALL enemies.
caster:StormGust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! card. caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !caster:M2! caster:Frost to ALL enemies.

caster:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
caster:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:Fira.NAME: Fira
caster:Fira.DESCRIPTION: Deals !M! additional damage for every turn you've been in combat. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:SpontaneousCombustion.NAME: Spontaneous Combustion
caster:SpontaneousCombustion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !caster:D! damage. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage three times to the enemy with the lowest HP.

caster:LordOfVermillion.NAME: Lord Of Vermillion
caster:LordOfVermillion.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy !M! [#F7FF00]x[] X times. NL caster:Shocker.

caster:Sleet.NAME: Sleet

caster:Sleet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy !caster:M2! times.

caster:MeteorStorm.NAME: Meteor Storm
caster:MeteorStorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! zero cost Meteors into your draw pile.

caster:ManaOverflow.NAME: Mana Overflow
caster:ManaOverflow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an elemental Spell add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.
caster:ManaOverflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play an elemental Spell add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.

caster:Charge.NAME: Charge
caster:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then caster:Electrify a random card in your hand.

caster:Sandstorm.NAME: Sandstorm
caster:Sandstorm.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength for 1 turn and gain 1 caster:Mired. NL Lose !caster:M2! Focus until the end of next turn.

caster:Heavy.NAME: Heavy
caster:Heavy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the damage you blocked last round .

caster:Slick.NAME: Slick
caster:Slick.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Blur and draw a card. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block.

caster:WallOfSwords.NAME: Wall Of Swords
caster:WallOfSwords.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lose up to !M! Block, gain that much Thorns. NL Exhaust.

caster:WallOfAsh.NAME: Wall Of Ash
caster:WallOfAsh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, your Block is also able to prevent HP Loss until next turn.

caster:Demi.NAME: Demi
caster:Demi.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL It loses !M! % of its current HP. NL Exhaust.

caster:Elementalize.NAME: Elementalize
caster:Elementalize.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Spell in your hand. NL Gain [E] for every Spell in your hand with the same Element.

caster:Unearth.NAME: Unearth
caster:Unearth.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! Spell from your draw pile, then restore HP equal to its energy cost. NL Exhaust.
caster:Unearth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! Spell from your draw pile, then restore HP equal to double its energy cost. NL Exhaust.

caster:GlacialShield.NAME: Glacial Shield
caster:GlacialShield.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! random card in your hand. NL Gain !caster:B! Block. caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block.
caster:GlacialShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! card in your hand. NL Gain !caster:B! Block. caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block.

caster:Ramuh.NAME: Ramuh
caster:Ramuh.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Electrify a card, reduce its cost to 0 for the turn.
caster:Ramuh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you caster:Electrify a card, reduce its cost to 0 for the turn.

caster:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
caster:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, apply !M! caster:Blazed to ALL enemies.

caster:Embers.NAME: Embers
caster:Embers.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each enemy that intends to attack. NL caster:Thaw up to !M! cards.

caster:Sultry.NAME: Sultry

caster:Sultry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Thaw up to !M! cards. NL When you draw this card draw !caster:M2! card.

caster:BurnItDown.NAME: Burn It Down
caster:BurnItDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Wall *of *Ash into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
caster:BurnItDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Wall *of *Ash+ into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

caster:Rectify.NAME: Rectify
caster:Rectify.DESCRIPTION: Choose an element, get a random Spell of that element. NL Exhaust.
caster:Rectify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an element, get a random Spell of that element, it costs 0 for this turn. NL Exhaust.

caster:IcicleLance.NAME: Icicle Lance
caster:IcicleLance.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Remove all Block from the enemy, then deal !caster:D! damage twice.

caster:Cryogenesis.NAME: Cryogenesis
caster:Cryogenesis.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze ALL cards in your hand. NL Draw !M! card for each card caster:Frozen this way. NL Exhaust.
caster:Cryogenesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze ALL cards in your hand. NL Draw !M! cards for each card caster:Frozen this way. NL Exhaust.

caster:BloodRitual.NAME: Blood Ritual
caster:BloodRitual.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Decrease the caster:Cast_Time of all your currently casted Spells by !caster:M2! NL Exhaust.

caster:IzanagisObdurance.NAME: Izanagi's Obdurance
caster:IzanagisObdurance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

caster:EchoingVoice.NAME: Echoing Voice

caster:EchoingVoice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Spells are played twice.

caster:SunGoddessAmaterasu.NAME: Sun Goddess Amaterasu
caster:SunGoddessAmaterasu.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Fire Spell, increase its damage by !M! % this combat.
caster:SunGoddessAmaterasu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Fire Spell, increase its damage by !M! % this combat.

caster:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
caster:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the caster:Cast_Time of a random Spell in your hand by 1.
caster:Incantation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the caster:Cast_Time of 2 random Spells in your hand by 1.

caster:QuickCast.NAME: Quick Cast

caster:QuickCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the caster:Cast_Time of a spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.

caster:WallOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block twice. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block and !M! Thorns.

caster:DivertFocus.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! Focus until the end of next turn.

caster:BookThrow.NAME: Book Throw
caster:BookThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of this turn.
